title: Cloud and Serverless
subTitle: AWS, Azure, GCP, Oracle cloud
description: I have 2 years of working in cloud, majorly in serverless stack. Building APIs and managing database and infrastructure.

title: API Development
subTitle: Serverless APIs, NodeJs, Python ,Postman, OpenAPI, Swagger
description: I have experience building APIs in NodeJs and Python. I have written some amazing documentations using OpenAPI specification, I learnt this as a challenge while upgrading a swagger 2 doc to OAS3.

title: Contact Tracing App
subTitle: Covid-19, Aarogya Setu, etc
description: Built infrastructure for a covid-19 contact app, (like Aarogue Setu) obstacle was, massive amount of egress traffic! Failed twice due to cost feasibility issues, 3rd time, it worked out fine.

title: 3rd Party Integrations
subTitle: Stripe, Hotelbeds, Kiwi, WeatherStack, Mapbox, etc
description: I also have integrated with backends such as firebase and AWS Amplify.

title: Scripting
subTitle: Python, Google App Scripting,Jupyter, Scripting, Competitive programming
description: I have developed good hands-on with python over last 5 years, and using jupiter notebooks. (Sometimes I use Jupyter while developing scripts as well, it reduces development time.), I used Google App script to automate simple tasks when using google sheets, gmail, calendar,etc

title: CICD and Automation
subTitle: Cloudbees Certified Jenkins Engineer, Github/Gitlab Actions, Bitbucket Pipelines, etc
description: I have been playing with Github actions for a couple of months, building CICD for projects. I am Jenkins Certified. I enjoy this a lot.

title: FullStack Development
subTitle: MERN Stack, serverless, vercel, static hosting, SSR
description: It's never easy to picture what an end result will look like especially when you are preparing a backend, sometimes you also need to know some basic frontend as well

title: React and React Native
subTitle: Still learning to write production level, manageable code.
description: Sometimes, you just need a guy who can quickly build and end-to-end POC, I have experience building POC in react and react native. heck, my react-native app is in production.

title: Chatbot using Google DialogueFlow
subTitle: I created a chatbot for playing Secret SantaüéÖ

title: NLP with Spacy
subTitle: Distractor generator challenge
description: Worked with spaCy (open-source NLP) and built a model with 26% accuracy for an open challenge. (I know it's low, best achieved was 34%... bring this up and we will talk about the problem statement and possible solutions that we could have done.)

title: Edge Computing ML
subTitle: Edge-ML and GA
description: Worked on genetic algorithms (Darwinism) and Edge-ML using raspberry and intel-neural-compute-stick and built 5 class image classification model.
